introductions.description: Are you ready to manage anger and bring your body and mind into balance through Earth Healing Mediation?

introductions.image: TO:DO - find image for create account and sign-up with email views
introductions.description: In 10 minutes you can learn to manage your anger and learn to love yourself by mastering the energy principle known as Water Up/Fire Down

introductions.heading: Welcome to Earth Healing Mediation
introductions.description: ...where mastering your anger helps heals the earth!

introductions.heading: What is Anger?
introductions.description:
It is an emotion that arises when there is a gap between what you want and reality.  
 
You may experience tension in your body or your head and face may feel hot.  Hence the expression 'Hot Headed'. 
 
Anger is trigger when what your desire is not manifested based on your expectations

introductions.heading: What Triggers Anger?
introductions.description:
DESIRE for 
 
 Control, Love, Recognition, Safety, Friendship. 
 
  Desire + Expectation Does Not Equality Reality ==> Anger

introductions.heading: Where Does Desire Come From?
introductions.description:
Two Places..... 
 
 Ego....and.....True Self 
 
 Ego ==> When the expectation of result is not met, you experience Anger 
 
 True Self or Soul or True Nature ==> When the expectation of the result is not met, you have the energy or will power to find a different solution

introductions.heading: How Do You Manage Anger?
introductions.description: By Mastering the Earth Healing Principle of Water Up/Fire Down

introductions.heading: What is Water Up/Fire Down?
introductions.description:
Your body is nature...meaning you come from the Earth. 
 
 Your body is also made up of energy.  When you move your body, you generate energy.  In a healthy state, energy circulation of your body is: 
 
 Cold Head (Water Up) 
 
 Open Heart 
 
 Warm Belly (Fire Down) 
 
 As emotions such as anger comes up within your body, the energy gets out of balance.  In case of anger, the energy circulation is reversed.  
 
 Instead of a cool head, you may experience a hot or heavy head, hence the expression 'Hot Headed'.  Also, your chest may feels tight and stuffy and your belly might feel cold and tight. 
 
 In order to manage anger, we need to work to keep our energy circulation in a healthy state.  A healthy energy circulation helps to strengthen your will power to find a different solution when your desire is not met based on your expectation

introductions.heading: How to Create and Maintain a Health Energy Circulation
introductions.description:
By taking a journey within yourself through the five steps of Brain Education 
 
 What is Brain Education? 
 
 Structure trainings  that provides you the methods to create energy circulation of Water Up/Fire Down 
 
 Five Steps 
 
 1. Brain Sensitizing 
 2. Brain Versatilizing 
 3. Brain Refreshing 
 4. Brain Integrating 5. Brain Mastery 
 
 Each step executed in sequence provides you the greatest chance of success to achieve a health energy state.

introductions.heading: Benefits of Brain Education
introductions.description:
1. Manage your emotions 
 2. Maintain healthy energy circulation within yourself and the Earth 
 3. Maintain Focus 
 4. Maximize your immunity

steps.title: sensitizing
steps.description1: Feeling your body while doing yoga and/or mediation in order to bring your mind to the present moment
steps.description2: To help minimize emotions, past and future thoughts by bringing the mind into the present moment

trainings.title: Belly Button Healing
trainings.explanation: Belly Button Healing is a gentle massage for your gut using the Belly Button Healing wand. Try this 10 minute routine of continuous Belly Button Healing and experience the gut healing, muscle relaxing, and mind calming benefits this method has to offer.

trainings.title: Brain Wave Vibration
trainings.explanation: Brain Wave Vibration is an exercise unique to Brain Education. It can help you reduce stress and clear heaviness and/or fogginess from your brain. Try this 10 minute routine to experience Brain Wave Vibration.

trainings.title: Chakra Healing
trainings.explanation: Have you ever tried or heard of Chakra Vocal Toning? It's a technique of creating vocal sounds to alter the energy frequency of your chakras. Try this 10 minute chakra vocal toning routine with Jen, a Brain Education instructor and energy guide from Sedona Wellness Cafe.
